committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Recreation
Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to prohibit the construction of dams within national parks and monuments.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Prohibits the construction of any new dam or impoundment within a national park or monument unless such construction is necessary for the purposes of such park or monument and park resources would not be degraded. Prohibits such construction outside park or monument boundaries if lands within the boundaries would be inundated. Prohibits the use of Federal lands to expand any reservoir within Yosemite National Park without specific congressional authorization.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the construction of dams within national parks and monuments.
